notesStmt.note: Folios 173 and 175 are slightly mutilated. Partly water-damaged in the top part of the folios.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: Midrash ha-gadol on Genesis, attributed to David Adani.

collation.p: 18 quires of 10 leaves each, apart from nos. 1 (11 leaves), 17 (8 leaves) and 18 (6 leaves). Signatures in Hebrew letters at the beginning of a quire.

binding.p: BM/BL in-house. Spine title: 'Midrash Haggadol. Genesis. Hebrew. Brit. Mus. Oriental 2213.'

history.provenance: Acquisition: Moses Wilhelm Shapira (b. 1830, d. 1884), a antiquities dealer of Jerusalem: purchased by the British Library from him on 13 December 1879: inscribed, folio [176v].
